successes.title: The ZBoard: The Weight-Sensing Electric Skateboard
successes.description: Lean Forward to Go. Lean Back to Stop. That's how you ride the ZBoard, the world's first, weight-sensing electric skateboard.

Pledges.description: EVERY DOLLAR COUNTS - Thanks for your support in helping us make the ZBoard a reality. We'll give you a big shout out on our website!

ZBOARD DECAL - You will receive a ZBoard Vinyl Decal that you can put on your car, bedroom window, snowboard, or anywhere else you can think to stick it. US domestic shipping is included. For international, please add $5.
T-SHIRT + DECAL - You will receive a ZBoard T-Shirt and a ZBoard Vinyl Decal. Please tell us your preferred size. US domestic shipping is included. For international, please add $10.

CLOSED - $100 DEPOSIT + KICKSTARTER PRICING - We have been instructed by the Kickstarter folks to close this reward as we are not allowed to offer deposits for later purchase (oops!). If you previously purchased this reward, you should have a message in your inbox instructing you how to cancel your pledge or increase it to the $495 or $745 rewards. Sorry for the inconvenience!

CLOSED - $250 DEPOSIT + KICKSTARTER PRICING + FREE SHIPPING - We have been instructed by the Kickstarter folks to close this reward as we are not allowed to offer deposits for later purchase (oops!). If you previously purchased this reward, you should have a message in your inbox instructing you how to cancel your pledge or increase it to the $495 or $745 rewards. Sorry for the inconvenience!

KICKSTARTER SPECIAL - You get a custom laser engraved ZBoard for $495 (the retail price will increase to $599 after March 15th, 2012). Your name and contributor number (#001 to #100) will be laser engraved into the underside of the anodized aluminum battery box. Also, these will be the first ZBoards to ship! S/H included to the contiguous 48 states. All others will receive a $50 credit towards the shipping quote.

***EXTENDED DUE TO POPULAR DEMAND*** KICKSTARTER CLASSIC SPECIAL - You get a custom laser engraved ZBoard for $495 (the retail price will increase to $599 after April 2nd, 2012). Your name and contributor number (#001 to #500) will be laser engraved into the underside of the anodized aluminum battery box. S/H included to the contiguous 48 states. All others will receive a $50 credit towards the shipping quote.

KICKSTARTER PRO SPECIAL - You get a custom laser engraved ZBoard Pro for $745. This is our high performance model (the retail price will increase to $849 after March 15th, 2012). This is your only option if you are looking to pre-order the Pro model. Your name and contributor number (#001 to #100) will be laser engraved into the underside of the anodized aluminum battery box. Also, these will be the first ZBoards to ship! S/H included to the contiguous 48 states. All others will receive a $50 credit towards the shipping quote.

***EXTENDED DUE TO POPULAR DEMAND*** KICKSTARTER PRO SPECIAL - You get a custom laser engraved ZBoard for $745 (the retail price will increase to $849 after April 2nd, 2012). Your name and contributor number (#001 to #500) will be laser engraved into the underside of the anodized aluminum battery box. S/H included to the contiguous 48 states. All others will receive a $50 credit towards the shipping quote.

KICKSTARTER PRO SPECIAL + CHOICE OF BOX COLOR + CUSTOM DECK, BOX ENGRAVING - You get a one-of-a-kind custom ZBoard Pro. You pick the hand painted deck design (we'll work with you on this). You pick the battery box color. You pick the customized message engraved into the underside of the battery box which will be included along with your contributor number (#01 to #10). We will work with you to give your ZBoard a look that is customized to your liking. S/H included to the contiguous 48 states. All others will receive a $50 credit towards the shipping quote.

ZBOARD CLASSIC DEALER SPECIAL - You get 10 ZBoard Classics, each marked for resale, each engraved with the message of your choice. Each board is discounted an additional $50 off the Kickstarter pricing, and $150 off our recommended retail pricing ($595). Also, purchasing this reward moves you up to the front of the line when we begin discussing distribution. Domestic freight included. International freight to be handled by customer.

ZBOARD PRO DEALER SPECIAL - You get 10 ZBoard Pro Models, each marked for resale, each engraved with the message of your choice. Each board is discounted an additional $70 off the Kickstarter pricing, and $170 off our recommended retail pricing ($845). Also, purchasing this reward moves you up to the front of the line when we begin discussing distribution. Domestic freight included. International freight to be handled by customer.
